cards.name: Apocalypse
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.
Take 10 damage.

cards.name: Apocalypse+
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
Take 15 damage.

cards.name: Crescent Moon Slash
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.
If this kills an enemy, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Crescent Moon Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
If this kills an enemy, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Eight Feet Tall
cards.description:
Target non-boss enemy dies in 5 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eight Feet Tall+
cards.description:
Target non-boss enemy dies in 5 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gap Woman
cards.description:
Apply 99 Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gap Woman+
cards.description:
Apply 99 Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: HAARP
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Lightning.

cards.name: HAARP+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 2 Lightning.

cards.name: Kunekune
cards.description:
Apply 2 gensokyo:Lunacy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kunekune+
cards.description:
Apply 2 gensokyo:Lunacy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Little Green Men
cards.description:
Gain [E].
Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Little Green Men+
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain [E].
Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Loch Ness Monster
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 8 times.

cards.name: Loch Ness Monster+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 10 times.

cards.name: Manor of the Dishes
cards.description: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards, gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Manor of the Dishes+
cards.description: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards, gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Men in Black
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Men in Black+
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Miss Mary
cards.description:
Apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Miss Mary+
cards.description:
Apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Monkey's Paw
cards.description:
Lose half of your current HP.
Gain 12 Gold for each HP lost this way.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Monkey's Paw+
cards.description:
Lose half of your current HP.
Gain 15 Gold for each HP lost this way.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Red Cape Blue Cape
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Deal 10 damage.
Add gensokyo:Red_Cape and gensokyo:Blue_Cape to your hand.

cards.name: Red Cape Blue Cape+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Deal 13 damage.
Add gensokyo:Red_Cape+ and gensokyo:Blue_Cape+ to your hand.

cards.name: Seven School Mysteries
cards.description: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards in a single turn, gain 3 Strength and 3 Dexterity.

cards.name: Seven School Mysteries+
cards.description: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards in a single turn, gain 4 Strength and 4 Dexterity.

cards.name: Slit Mouthed Woman
cards.description:
The next time you are attacked, apply 3 Vulnerable to the attacker.
The second next time you are attacked, the attacker loses 3 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slit Mouthed Woman+
cards.description:
The next time you are attacked, apply 4 Vulnerable to the attacker.
The second next time you are attacked, the attacker loses 4 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spontaneous Human Combustion
cards.description:
Gain 5 Strength.
At the end of your turn, take !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! damage and increase the damage you will take from this power by !Gensokyo:SecondMagic!.

cards.name: Spontaneous Human Combustion+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Strength.
At the end of your turn, take !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! damage and increase the damage you will take from this power by !Gensokyo:SecondMagic!.

cards.name: Teke Teke
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! times to ALL enemies.
If this brings an enemy below half HP, increase this card's damage by 7 this combat.

cards.name: Teke Teke+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! times to ALL enemies.
If this brings an enemy below half HP, increase this card's damage by 10 this combat.

cards.name: Turbo Granny
cards.description:
Gain 3 Dexterity.
Gain !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! Plated Armor.

cards.name: Turbo Granny+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Dexterity.
Gain !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! Plated Armor.

cards.name: Frozen!
cards.description:
When this card is drawn, reduce its cost by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Bombinomicon
relics.description: At the start of combat, add The Bomb with Retain and Exhaust to your hand.

relics.name: Book of Specters
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 3 cards. Discard all non-Attack cards drawn this way.
relics.flavorText: A book written by a lonely necromancer who just wanted to make some friends.

relics.name: Celestial's Flawless Clothing
relics.description: When you would die, heal to full HP and add an Avatar of Death to the current encounter. Only works while in combat and will not trigger if an Avatar of Death is already present.

relics.name: Justice
relics.description: The first time you play 2 Attacks each turn, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.

relics.name: Lunatic Red Eyes
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 1 gensokyo:Lunacy to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: These eyes have no effect on you. After all, you're already insane.

relics.name: Mercy
relics.description: The first time you play 2 Skills each turn, gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: It is mercy, not justice or courage or even heroism, that alone can defeat evil.

relics.name: Nagashi-bina Doll
relics.description: At the end of your turn, exhaust a random Curse in your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you look closely, you can almost see the tendrils of misfortune seeping into the doll.

relics.name: Occult Ball
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a random Urban Legend to your hand. Occasionally find more Occult Balls.
relics.flavorText: It is said that if you collect seven of them, they would make your wildest dreams come true.

relics.name: Perfect Cherry Blossom
relics.description: The next time you would die, heal to 10% of your Max HP instead. Whenever you would die, kill ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A favor bestowed upon you for befriending a lonely girl.

relics.name: Portable Gap
relics.description: You may ignore paths and distances when choosing the next room to travel to. Whenever you use this effect, lose 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: As you stare into the abyss, a thousand eyes stare back at you.

relics.name: Youkai Flower
relics.flavorText: The flower seems to be watching you, always craning its neck to follow you around wherever you are.

keywords.name: Gensokyo:Blue Cape
keywords.description: A 1 cost Skill that gains Block, Retains, and exhausts.

keywords.name: Gensokyo:Red Cape
keywords.description: A 1 cost Attack that deals damage, Retains, and exhausts.

keywords.name: Gensokyo:lunacy
keywords.description: Whenever a lunatic enemy attacks or applies a debuff, a random enemy is targeted instead.
